name: Old-Style Mustard and Rosemary Asparagus
description: This simple green side features asparagus roasted with old-fashioned grain mustard, fresh rosemary, lemon zest, olive oil, and sea salt.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425°F. Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss the asparagus with all the other other ingredients on the baking sheet until combined. Roast for 10 to 12 minutes. Serve immediately.
